Package io.github.jspinak.brobot.actions

Class BrobotEnvironment.Builder

java.lang.Object
io.github.jspinak.brobot.actions.BrobotEnvironment.Builder
Enclosing class:
BrobotEnvironment
public static class BrobotEnvironment.Builder extends Object
Builder for creating custom BrobotEnvironment configurations.

  • Method Details

    • mockMode

      public BrobotEnvironment.Builder mockMode(boolean mockMode)
      Sets mock mode. In mock mode, all operations return fake data.
      Parameters:
      mockMode - true to enable mock mode
      Returns:
      this builder

    • forceHeadless

      public BrobotEnvironment.Builder forceHeadless(Boolean forceHeadless)
      Forces headless mode regardless of actual display availability. Useful for testing headless behavior on systems with displays.
      Parameters:
      forceHeadless - true to force headless, false to force display mode, null to auto-detect
      Returns:
      this builder

    • allowScreenCapture

      public BrobotEnvironment.Builder allowScreenCapture(boolean allowScreenCapture)
      Sets whether screen capture is allowed even when display is available.
      Parameters:
      allowScreenCapture - true to allow screen capture
      Returns:
      this builder

    • verboseLogging

      public BrobotEnvironment.Builder verboseLogging(boolean verboseLogging)
      Enables verbose logging of environment decisions.
      Parameters:
      verboseLogging - true to enable verbose logging
      Returns:
      this builder

    • fromEnvironment

      public BrobotEnvironment.Builder fromEnvironment()
      Creates a configuration from environment variables and system properties. Environment variables: - BROBOT_MOCK_MODE=true/false - BROBOT_FORCE_HEADLESS=true/false - BROBOT_ALLOW_SCREEN_CAPTURE=true/false System properties take precedence over environment variables.
      Returns:
      this builder

    • build

      public BrobotEnvironment build()
      Builds the BrobotEnvironment configuration.
      Returns:
      configured BrobotEnvironment
